title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Data innovation: Amazon S3 Access Points for FSx for NetApp ONTAP (STG219)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 数据创新：适用于 FSx for NetApp ONTAP 的 Amazon S3 访问点 (STG219)
abstract: You can now attach Amazon S3 Access Points to your Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP file systems to access your file data as if it were in Amazon S3. Learn how this data innovation provides streamlined workflows while opening new use cases for your FSx file data.
abstract_cn: 现在，您可以将 Amazon S3 Access Points 附加到 Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP 文件系统，以便像访问 Amazon S3 中的数据一样访问您的文件数据。了解这一数据创新如何简化工作流程，同时为您的 FSx 文件数据开启新的使用场景。
